includedAssets.title: Horrible Bosses
includedAssets.synopsis: Three disgruntled employees plot to kill nightmare bosses Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell in this outrageous comedy.

includedAssets.title: Horrible Bosses Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Three friends try to get rid of their awful bosses in the most extreme way possible, then have their plan to start up their own business hijacked by a manipulative investor. Two outrageous comedies starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston, Colin Farrell, Jamie Foxx, Chris Pine and Christoph Waltz.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Three friends try to get rid of their bosses, then start up a business. Two outrageous comedies with Jason Bateman, Charlie Day and Jason Sudeikis.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Three friends try to get rid of their awful bosses in the most extreme way possible, then have their plan to start up their own business hijacked by a manipulative investor. Two outrageous comedies starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston, Colin Farrell, Jamie Foxx, Chris Pine and Christoph Waltz.

includedIn.title: Horrible Bosses
includedIn.synopsis: Three friends decide to do whatever it takes to rid themselves of their nightmare bosses, so hatch a plan to kill them. Later, their attempts to start a new business hit a road block in the form of a manipulative investor, forcing them to turn to kidnap to keep their dreams alive.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Three friends decide to get rid of their nightmare bosses. Later, as they try to start a new business, a cruel investor forces them to turn to kidnap.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Three friends decide to do whatever it takes to rid themselves of their nightmare bosses, so hatch a plan to kill them. Later, their attempts to start a new business hit a road block in the form of a manipulative investor, forcing them to turn to kidnap to keep their dreams alive.
